On this site you will find examples of how to create a static website with examples of

- Web page
- Notebook
- Presentation


## Web page

Easily create pages by entering text in markdown format. Quarto will format it into pretty pages.

You can use a wide range of tools:
- Tables, Lists
- Images, Videos
- Python or R code
- mathematical formulas
- Export pdf
